thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Hedge Funds’ Favorite Charity Is Funding Their Opponents

author: Rob Copeland
title: Hedge Funds’ Favorite Charity Is Funding Their Opponents
text:
The 250-person protest group that showed up outside billionaire Daniel Loeb’s Hamptons estate arrived in chartered buses, carried professionally printed signs and marched under two airplanes with banners. Several signs read: “Hedge funds = inequality.”
Mr. Loeb, in a roundabout way, inadvertently backed certain organizations that supported that July 2015 demonstration, and continue to savage hedge funds to this day.
For...
